description: brown body with wide shoulder and small mouth; brown body and stopper with central inlaid flower inside a diamond on each side, surrounded by repeating quatrefoil or flower-like patterns; inlaid leaf form on underside; spoon lost
title: Snuff bottle with inlaid flower motifs
